alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 20 at 3:03PM MST until February 20 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect through 6 PM today for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 227...228...229 and 230 which includes southern El Paso, Pueblo, Huerfano, and western Las Animas Counties... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for Monday from 10 AM through 7 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 228...229...230...232...233...and 235 through 237 which includes Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Otero, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228...229 AND 230... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM MST MONDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228...229 AND 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity values, which is in effect from 10 AM to 7 PM MST Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228...229 and 230. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 4 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
